WORK IN PROGRESS

## Get It!

The image is available on `cgr.dev`:

```
docker pull cgr.dev/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest
```

## Supported tags

| Tag | Digest | Arch |
| --- | ------ | ---- |
| `latest` | `sha256:5fb326e6d0c688c1dbf66c87b992720258510a767e28c298d6eda208ea6de905`<br/>[View entry in Rekor](https://rekor.tlog.dev/?hash=sha256:5fb326e6d0c688c1dbf66c87b992720258510a767e28c298d6eda208ea6de905) | `amd64` |



## Signing

All Chainguard Images are signed using [Sigstore](https://sigstore.dev)!

<details>
<br/>
To verify the image, download <a href="https://github.com/sigstore/cosign">cosign</a> and run:

```
COSIGN_EXPERIMENTAL=1 cosign verify cgr.dev/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest | jq
```

This image is built with [apko](https://github.com/chainguard-dev/apko).
